page.title: 07GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In our playground we play lots of games, one of them is called {'Elastic'}.Two people put the elastic round their feet and another person jumps in and out of it.There are lots of different steps.Another popular game is marbles.{Marbles}is played on drains.On our drains there are triangular pieces sticking up. The marbles go everwhere.They carry on going until they hit one of the others.Another game is{'Bull dog'}.In our playground there are two semi circles .We all stand in one of them and a person chooses another person and they have to hit them .If the person who is hit didn't hit the other one ,all the other people run to the far circle.
